text: Qi Baishi (1 January 1864 - 16 September 1957) was a Chinese painter. He was known for his watercolor works. In 1953, he was elected president of the China Artists Association (中國美術家協會). He died in Beijing in 1957. ==Other websites== *Qi Baishi's paintings at China Online Museum *Qi Baishi's artwork and bibliography *About.com page on Qi Baishi *Straddling East and West: Lin Yutang, a modern literatus: the Lin Yutang family collection of Chinese painting and calligraphy, an exhibition catalog from The Metropolitan Museum of Art Libraries (fully available online as PDF), which contains material on Qi Baishi (see table of contents) Category:1864 births Category:1957 deaths Category:20th-century Chinese painters Category:19th-century Chinese people
title: Qi Baishi
